title: Cannot read property 'firstChild' of undefined
body:
Hi,

I am experimenting with https://github.com/kitematic/kitematic and I hit a problem with react 0.12.2 with react-router 0.12.4. On the first navigation using the router I get the following error. Ialready read the thread: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/27153166/typeerror-when-using-react-cannot-read-property-firstchild-of-undefined and the referenced react issues, but I checked external dependencies, and I have only one version of react added to the project, and it is added by the main project itself (no additional dependency is downloading react).

I also checked the use of require('react'), but it seems to be fine as well. I would appreciate any help with the issue.
